name: @exercism/javascript-test-runner
description: Automated Test runner for exercism solutions in Javascript.
author: Derk-Jan Karrenbeld <derk-jan+github@karrenbeld.info>

scripts.execute:dev: corepack pnpm build && corepack pnpm execute
scripts.build: corepack pnpm clean && corepack pnpm tsc --project ./src/tsconfig.json --outDir ./dist
scripts.prepublish: corepack pnpm test:bare && corepack pnpm lint
scripts.lint: corepack pnpm eslint src -c eslint.config.mjs && corepack pnpm eslint test -c eslint.config.mjs
scripts.test: corepack pnpm build && corepack pnpm test:bare
scripts.test:bare: corepack pnpm node test/smoke.test.mjs && corepack pnpm node test/skip.test.mjs && corepack pnpm node test/log.test.mjs && corepack pnpm node test/taskid.test.mjs
